As a platform-based approach to online threat reduction, NS8 Protect is designed to help your store fight the three big revenue killers: order fraud, advertising fraud, and poor performance.<\/div>\r\n\r\n<div>&nbsp;<\/div>\r\n\r\n<div>&nbsp;<\/div>\r\n\r\n<div><strong>Revenue Killer #1: Order Fraud<\/strong><\/div>\r\n\r\n<div>NS8 Protect scores every visitor to your storefront. Every action taken by the visitor leading up to and including placing an order is scored individually and reflected in the EQ8 Score. Low-scoring orders are most likely fraudulent and may be held or flagged for manual review. NS8 Protect also provides automated tools to escalate suspect orders or even request e-mail and SMS text verification from the visitor. The mix of automated tools and easier manual reviews empowers merchants to optimize their order processing and minimize risk.&nbsp;<\/div>\r\n\r\n<div>&nbsp;<\/div>\r\n\r\n<ul>\r\n\t<li>Benefit from the network of stores and websites already tagging fraudulent users and suspicious behavior by using NS8 software.<\/li>\r\n\t<li>Reduce costly chargebacks and the risk they pose to your merchant account.<\/li>\r\n\t<li>Reduce both the labor dedicated to manual review and shipping lead times.<\/li>\r\n\t<li>Set your own custom threshold for suspect orders and users.<\/li>\r\n<\/ul>\r\n\r\n<div>&nbsp;<\/div>\r\n\r\n<div><strong>Revenue Killer #2: Advertising Fraud<\/strong><\/div>\r\n\r\n<div>&nbsp;<\/div>\r\n\r\n<div>Advertising fraud (especially remarketing fraud) is a huge and growing issue for online merchants. NS8 Protect not only scores all traffic visiting your store, but it also detects and records the traffic&rsquo;s source. You will see when, and which, advertising sources are delivering low-quality, high-risk, fraudulent traffic. You will be able to save money and increase revenue by eliminating poorly performing campaigns and focusing your budget on the successful campaigns that deliver results.<\/div>\r\n\r\n<div>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/div>\r\n\r\n<ul>\r\n\t<li>Compare scored campaigns for the presence of bot traffic and fraud.<\/li>\r\n\t<li>Prevent bots and fraudulent users from being tagged for remarketing.<\/li>\r\n\t<li>Integrate with Google Analytics to tag high-value users for more effective remarketing.<\/li>\r\n\t<li>Track your store&rsquo;s advertising savings from blocked fraudulent users.<\/li>\r\n<\/ul>\r\n\r\n<div>&nbsp;<\/div>\r\n\r\n<div><strong>Revenue Killer #3: Poor Performance<\/strong><\/div>\r\n\r\n<div>&nbsp;<\/div>\r\n\r\n<div>NS8 Protect includes 5 critical monitors that every PrestaShop store should have. europ&eacute;en et mettez votre boutique en conformit&eacute; !<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;<br \/>\r\nD&eacute;velopp&eacute; par l&rsquo;&eacute;quipe de PrestaShop avec l&rsquo;accompagnement de nos experts RGPD, le module RGPD Officiel est&nbsp;<strong>le seul &agrave; vous offrir une solution adapt&eacute;e &agrave; votre site&nbsp;<\/strong>traitant les donn&eacute;es personnelles collect&eacute;es par la solution PrestaShop mais &eacute;galement par les modules install&eacute;s sur votre boutique.*<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;<br \/>\r\n<em>*Plus de d&eacute;tails dans 1.6.<\/em>","additionalDescription":"<strong><em>Qu&rsquo;est-ce que le RGPD ?<\/em><\/strong><br \/>\r\n&nbsp;<br \/>\r\nNouveau cadre juridique europ&eacute;en, le RGPD a vocation &agrave; encadrer l&rsquo;utilisation qui est faite des donn&eacute;es personnelles des utilisateurs. Il s&rsquo;applique &agrave; tout traitement de donn&eacute;es &agrave; caract&egrave;re personnel (ex : collecte, conservation, extraction, utilisation, destruction, etc.), automatis&eacute; ou non.<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;<br \/>\r\nUne donn&eacute;e &agrave; caract&egrave;re personnel est une information permettant d&rsquo;identifier une personne physique, directement ou indirectement (ex : nom\/pr&eacute;nom, adresse mail, adresse IP, num&eacute;ro de t&eacute;l&eacute;phone, etc.).<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;<br \/>\r\n<strong>Pourquoi choisir notre module RGPD ?<\/strong><br \/>\r\n&nbsp;<br \/>\r\nLe module<strong>&nbsp;RGPD Officiel by PrestaShop<\/strong>&nbsp;vous accompagne dans la mise en conformit&eacute; de votre boutique au RGPD. Il r&eacute;pond aux obligations principales de ce r&egrave;glement europ&eacute;en concernant les donn&eacute;es personnelles de vos clients dont :<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;\r\n<ul>\r\n\t<li>Le droit d&rsquo;acc&eacute;der &agrave; leurs donn&eacute;es personnelles et le droit &agrave; leur portabilit&eacute;<\/li>\r\n\t<li>Le droit d&rsquo;obtenir la rectification et\/ou l&rsquo;effacement de leurs donn&eacute;es<\/li>\r\n\t<li>Le droit de retirer leur consentement lorsque celui-ci leur a &eacute;t&eacute; demand&eacute;<\/li>\r\n<\/ul>\r\n&nbsp;<br \/>\r\nIl vous permet &eacute;galement de conserver un journal de bord de l&rsquo;ensemble des activit&eacute;s de vos clients concernant leurs donn&eacute;es personnelles (notamment l&rsquo;accessibilit&eacute;, le consentement et l&rsquo;effacement des donn&eacute;es).
